name: Super Snake Off
description:
A two player competitive game for your NES. Pick your favourite snake from the over 100 combinations and outwit and out skill your opponent to win. 

Setup: ButtonActionSelectRandomize SnakeStartReady UpUp/DownChange Snake StyleLeft/RightChange Snake Color / SettingsAAdvanceBCancel In Game: StartPause / UnpauseDirectionsMove Snake Post Game: StartReturn to SetupSelectRematch
